mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rock Springs Plantation Reynolds Homestead Furnishing Accession Register
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The register contains images and details of the furnishings, including the source of furniture pieces where Nancy Susan Reynolds acquired them in her effort of restoring the Reynolds Homestead (formerly known as the Rock Spring Plantation). The register provides context to the Pre-Civil War Southen Decorative Arts.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Reynolds family
Decorative arts, Early American
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
